title: Version 2.1.1 Released
description: Claude Code v2.1.1 was released on January 7, 2026, bringing general improvements and bug fixes to the agentic coding tool.

title: Version 2.0.76 - Chrome Code-Sign Fix
description: Released v2.0.76 with a fix for macOS code-sign warning when using Claude in Chrome integration.

title: Beta Release v1.5.29
description: Continue extension released daily beta updates in early January 2026 with bug fixes and improvements for VS Code and JetBrains integration.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Model Available
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available across Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse for Copilot users, offering advanced reasoning with Flash-level speed.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Model Available
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available for all users, combining Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed. Achieves 78% on SWE-bench Verified benchmark with 3x faster performance than previous generations.

community_feedback.quote: Google's Gemini 3 just changed everything and nobody saw this coming

title: Wave 13: Merry Shipmas - Multi-Agent Sessions
description: Wave 13 introduces first-class support for parallel, multi-agent sessions with Git worktrees, side-by-side Cascade panes, dedicated terminal profile, and SWE-1.5 Free model available for 3 months.

community_feedback.quote: burning through Windsurf credits way too fast
tried them all but Sonnet is still the model I'm most productive with

title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements
description: Holiday release focused on fixing bugs and improving stability including core agent, layout controls, and code diff viewing. Added four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) with keyboard shortcuts.

community_feedback.quote: pausing UI changes and working to minimize UI changes going forward
bugs and ever-changing UI irk developers

title: Version 1.12.47 - LLM Promo Labels
description: Added new 'Promo' label to LLM models that are newly available or have special discount pricing, along with multiple bug fixes for agents, tool execution, UI rendering, and platform messaging.

title: GPT-5.2 Model Available
description: GPT-5.2 is now available in Windsurf at 0x credits for paid users for a limited time. Described as the biggest leap for GPT models in agentic coding since GPT-5.

title: Version 1.12.41 - Cascade Hooks and MCP Improvements
description: Added Cascade Hooks on user prompts for logging and policy enforcement, GitLab remote MCP support, OAuth for GitHub remote MCP, and various diff zone and Tab autocomplete improvements.

title: Debug Mode, Plan Mode, and Multi-Agent Features
description: Released Cursor 2.2 with Debug Mode for reproducing tricky bugs, Browser layout and style editor for visual design, Plan Mode improvements with Mermaid diagrams, multi-agent judging, and pinned chats.

title: Agent Skills Support
description: GitHub Copilot now supports Agent Skills, allowing users to teach Copilot how to perform specialized tasks in a specific, repeatable way.

community_feedback.quote: Improved speed and reduced context consumption

title: GPT-5.1-Codex Max Available
description: Introduced GPT-5.1-Codex Max in three reasoning tiers (Low, Medium, High), with Low variant available at no cost to paid users for a limited time.
